description: Joey Landis is the ultimate host here at Club Twink. Not only does he take care of front desk duties, but he even volunteers to help the guests wash their cars. In this scene, Joey and Andrew Blaze start out with a simple carwash, but playful fun leads to serious sex as the boyz quickly strip naked and swap blow jobs before Andrew gets his tight ass fucked hard by big-dicked Joey. This is what we call service with a smile!
title: CitiBoyz 14: Tropical Twinks, Scene #03
